code: import*as ActionTypes from"./ActionTypes";export var favorites=function favorites(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ActionTypes.ADD_FAVORITE:if(state.some(function(el){return el===action.payload;}))return state;else return state.concat(action.payload);case ActionTypes.DELETE_FAVORITE:return state.filter(function(item){return item!==action.payload;});default:return state;}};
